original: Andreasson, Johan Edwin, grosshandlare, Uddevalla,_ f. 1/12/90 i Färge-landa, Älvsb. 1., av jordbr. Aron A. o. h. h. f. Magnusson. G. 1. 18 m. Annie Arvidsson, d. 22; 2. 28 m. Hedvig Arvidsson. Barn: Marianne f. 32. — Genomg. hand:inst. i Uddevalla! Res. t. Engl., Norge o. Danm. Anst. i firma J. A. Zetterkvist 05-06, Hansson & Hasiseilberg Spec. o. Skeppsfourner. i Uddevalla 06-19, inneh. av denna sed. 19, av Hansson & Hasselbergs engros-rör. S’ed. 32. Ordf. i Uddeva’Ha köpm:-för. Spec: gr upp, Uddevalla Kreditsystem samt i Bohusl. köpm:förb. o. dess spec :branschavd., led. av Gbgs o. Boh. 1. samarb:nd, led. av tax:ndn, rev. f. Uddevalla h. a. 1. byggn:fond, led. av hamntaxeberedn., v. ordf. i styr. f. A-B Gbgs Hand :banks avd:-kont. i Uddevalla, besiktn :man f. skador å varor, led. av kristidsstyr., led. av stadsfullm. samt dess v. ordf., led. av hamnstyr. o. hand:- o. sjöfartsndn, styr :suppl. i Sv:es speceri- o. livsm:-handl:förb., v. ordf. i Uddevalla turist-fören. Medl. av Odd Fellow, Uddevalla Rotarykl. o. Frimurarorden. Sv:es köpm:förb. hed :t. i guld.
translated: Andreasson, Johan Edwin, merchant, born on December 1, 1890 in Färge-landa, Älvsborg County, son of farmer Aron A. and his wife Magnusson. Married first with Annie Arvidsson for 18 months, she passed away; married second with Hedvig Arvidsson for 28 months. They had one child, Marianne, born in 1932. He attended business school in Uddevalla and travelled to England, Norway, and Denmark. He worked for the firm J.A. Zetterkvist in 1905-1906, then for Hansson & Hasiseilberg Spec. and Skeppsfourner in Uddevalla from 1906-1919, until becoming the owner of this business in 1919 when it became Hansson & Hasselberg’s wholesale business. He was chairman of the Uddevalla Merchants' Association, specializing in setting up the Uddevalla Credit System as well as for the Bohuslän Merchants' Association, and its special trade division. He was a member of the Gothenburg and Bohusläns Joint Association, the valuation committee, and the audit committee for the Uddevalla building fund. He was also vice-chairman of the board of directors for AB Gothenburg's Hand Bank's branch office in Uddevalla, inspector for damages to goods, a member of the crisis management committee, a member and vice-chairman of the city council, a member of the port authority, and the trade and shipping committee. He was a board substitute for the Swedish Condiment and Food Merchant Association, the vice-chairman of the Uddevalla Tourist Association, and a member of Odd Fellow, Uddevalla Rotary Club, and the Freemasons. He was honored by the Swedish Merchants' Association with a gold medal.

memberOf.name: Swedish Condiment and Food Merchant Association
